price: 18. Iš tiesų, jis (Muchammedas ﷺ) matė Didžiausius Ženklus iš savo Viešpaties.
arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: laqad raā min āyāti rabbihi al-kub'rā
